entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is referred to as 'Potter' by the Death Eater.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a character who intervenes in the scene and tries to protect the prophecy.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches who are trying to obtain the prophecy.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy intervenes in the scene to try and protect the prophecy from being smashed by the Death Eater.
The Death Eater tries to attack Harry with a spell, but he is able to defend himself.
Lucius Malfoy restrains the Death Eater from smashing the prophecy.
